name: Daphne Byrne #1
description:
cover art done for DC Comics/Joe Hill book 'Daphne Byrne' #1/6
Quote from Joe Hill page:
"The incomparable artist Kelley Jones (Sandman: Season of Mists) returns to the fright field with Daphne Byrne, a tale set in the golden era of spiritualism and seances. Get ready to be gaslit by gaslight in a mesmerizing story scripted by Laura Marks, a comics newbie and TV veteran. I met Laura working on the never aired version of Locke & Key prepped by Hulu and was blown away by her deft touch at dialogue and go for the throat instinct. And how about this skin-crawling first cover from Piotr Jablonski? So looking forward to this one."
